name: @weather/fetch-observations
description: Fetch tempest weather observations from an S3 bucket

scripts.start: npm run build && node -e 'require("./function/index.js").handler({ queryStringParameters: { columns: "windDirection", year:"2024", monthMin:"09", monthMax:"09", dayMin:"01", dayMax:"01", hourMin:"00",hourMax:"24" } })'
scripts.deploy: npm run build --workspace=@weather/cloud-computing && npm run build --workspace=@weather/fetch-observations && mkdir -p ../../lib/nodejs && rm -rf ../../lib/nodejs/node_modules && cp -RL ../../node_modules ../../lib/nodejs && sam build --config-env prod && sam deploy --config-env prod

author: Sam Younger
